output: pdf_document
---

```{r,echo=FALSE,results='asis'}
library(knitr)
tableFun<-function(vec,title){
  df=data.frame(vec)
  rownames(df)<-c("grpreg","bcd","glmnet")
  colnames(df)<-c("Time (seconds)")
  print(kable(df,caption=title))
}

```

```{r,echo=FALSE,results='asis'}
tableFun(c(3.80,5.20,1.03),"Dense design matrix, n=p=500")
tableFun(c(5.57,7.00,1.45),"Dense design matrix, n=1000, p=500")
tableFun(c(4.22,5.90,4.38),"Dense design matrix, n=500, p=1000")

```
